Summary[edit]

It is easy to put a border around this image: 
[[File:Flag of Mississippi.svg|border|100px]]
English: Flag of Mississippi
ᏣᎳᎩ: ᎻᏏᏏᏈ ᎦᏓᏘ
Español: Bandera de Misisipi
Français : Drapeau du Mississippi
Français cadien: Flag du Mississippi
Hawaiʻi: Ka hae Mikikipi
Latina: Vexillum Mississippiae
Diné bizaad: Mísísípii Hahoodzo
Deitsch: Faahne vun Mississippi
Русский: Флаг Миссисипи
Српски / srpski: Zastava američke savezne države Mississippi

Date/TimeThumbnailDimensionsUserComment
current20:35, 22 March 2013900 × 600 (1 KB)Abjiklam (talk | contribs)simpler. border around canton as thick as saltire's fimbriation
